desc: ResCo Resin is a leading resin bound and resin bonded systems manufacturer that supplies resin bound kits and supplies including gravel, aggregate and all types of resin from standard to UV and UVR resin.

layout.text: Resin bound resins, aggregates, catalysts and sealers manufactured here in the UK, supplying directly to the Trade and Public. With upwards of 15 years experience in the manufacture and testing of resins under our belt.
